mapper.select: SELECT A.ID , A.LOGIN_ID , A.PASSWORD , A.NAME , A.PHONE , A.NICKNAME , A.IMAGE , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT , A.ACTIVE , A.INTRODUCTION FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.ID = #{ id }
SELECT A.ID , A.LOGIN_ID , A.PASSWORD , A.NAME , A.PHONE , A.NICKNAME , A.IMAGE , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT , A.ACTIVE , A.INTRODUCTION FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.LOGIN_ID = #{ loginId }
SELECT A.ID , A.LOGIN_ID , A.PASSWORD , A.NAME , A.PHONE , A.NICKNAME , A.IMAGE , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT , A.ACTIVE , A.INTRODUCTION FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.NICKNAME = #{ nickname }

SELECT A.ID , A.LOGIN_ID , A.PASSWORD , A.NAME , A.PHONE , A.NICKNAME , A.IMAGE , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT , A.ACTIVE , A.INTRODUCTION FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.NAME = #{ name } AND A.PHONE = #{ phone }

SELECT A.ID , A.LOGIN_ID , A.PASSWORD , A.NAME , A.PHONE , A.NICKNAME , A.IMAGE , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT , A.ACTIVE , A.INTRODUCTION FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.LOGIN_ID = #{ loginId } AND A.PHONE = #{ phone }
SELECT A.ID , A.LOGIN_ID , A.PASSWORD , A.NAME , A.PHONE , A.NICKNAME , A.IMAGE , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT , A.ACTIVE , A.INTRODUCTION FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.ID = #{ id }

SELECT M.ID , M.LOGIN_ID , M.PASSWORD , M.NAME AS memberName , M.PHONE , M.NICKNAME , M.IMAGE , M.INTRODUCTION , M.CREATED_AT , M.UPDATED_AT , M.ACTIVE AS memberActive , R.NAME AS roleName , R.ACTIVE AS roleActive FROM TBL_MEMBER M INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER_ROLE MR ON (M.ID = MR.MEMBER_ID) INNER JOIN TBL_ROLE R ON (MR.ROLE_ID = R.ID) WHERE M.LOGIN_ID = #{ memberId } GROUP BY R.NAME

SELECT M.ID , M.LOGIN_ID , M.PASSWORD , M.NAME AS memberName , M.PHONE , M.NICKNAME , M.IMAGE , M.INTRODUCTION , M.CREATED_AT , M.UPDATED_AT , M.ACTIVE AS memberActive , R.NAME AS roleName , R.ACTIVE AS roleActive FROM TBL_MEMBER M INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER_ROLE MR ON (M.ID = MR.MEMBER_ID) INNER JOIN TBL_ROLE R ON (MR.ROLE_ID = R.ID) WHERE M.ID = #{ memberId } GROUP BY R.NAME
